title: Dashboard Layout Responsiveness
description: Verify the dashboard layout renders correctly and is fully responsive across all supported device breakpoints including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open the dashboard page on a desktop device
Check that sidebar, header and main content panels are laid out correctly with no overlap or content cut-off
Resize the browser window to tablet size dimensions
Confirm the sidebar collapses appropriately and header adjusts for tablet usability
Simulate viewing the dashboard on a mobile device
Verify the sidebar is accessible via mobile-optimized header menu and content is fully visible without horizontal scrolling

title: Metric Cards Data Accuracy
description: Validate metric cards correctly display values, percentage changes, and trend icons consistent with mocked data sources.

steps.description: Load dashboard with mocked metric data
Verify each metric card shows correct KPI value as per data
Check percentage change value matches expected computation from mocked data
Confirm the trend icon reflects the positive, negative, or neutral change correctly

title: Interactive Charts Rendering and Tooltips
description: Ensure all charts (line, bar, donut) render correctly with appropriate axis labels, legends, color schemes, and interactive tooltips.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard charts section
Validate line chart displays revenue trend with correctly labeled X and Y axes
Validate bar chart displays traffic sources by channel with correct bar heights and labels
Validate donut chart shows device distribution with appropriate color segments and legend
Hover mouse over various data points on each chart
Confirm tooltips show accurate and well-formatted data values matching underlying data

title: Campaign Data Table Functionalities
description: Test the campaign performance data table supports sorting, search, filtering, and pagination without errors.

steps.description: Open campaign data table section on the dashboard
Sort the table by each column (e.g., campaign name, performance metrics)
Confirm that sorting results reorder the table correctly in ascending and descending order
Enter search terms to filter campaign rows
Verify table updates to show only matching rows or shows 'no results' if none match
Apply various column filters (e.g., date range, campaign status)
Check the filtered table rows meet the filter criteria precisely
Navigate through table pagination controls
Ensure pagination changes the displayed rows accurately and page counts are correct

title: Simulated Real-Time Data Refresh
description: Verify the dashboard refresh mechanism updates metrics, charts, and tables with new simulated real-time data and provides visual feedback.

steps.description: Trigger the data refresh action on the dashboard
Confirm that metric cards update their displayed values and trend icons accordingly
Validate charts redraw with updated data smoothly and maintain interactive elements functionality
Ensure the campaign data table reflects any new or updated campaign entries post-refresh
Check for a visible loading or refresh indicator during data update
Verify the refresh completes within acceptable timeframe (e.g., under 3 seconds)

title: Accessibility Compliance
description: Ensure the dashboard meets accessibility standards including ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, and adequate contrast ratios.

steps.description: Navigate through the dashboard using the keyboard tab key only
Validate all interactive elements (sidebar, buttons, charts, table controls) are accessible via keyboard
Check all ARIA attributes are present and correctly describe component roles and states
Use automated tools to analyze color contrast on text and UI elements ensuring they meet WCAG AA standards

title: Code Quality and Linting Validation
description: Verify the entire codebase passes ESLint rules, TypeScript strict type checks, and Prettier formatting without errors.

steps.description: Run ESLint across the full codebase
Confirm zero linting errors or warnings
Execute TypeScript compilation with strict type checking enabled
Ensure no type errors are reported
Run Prettier formatting check
Validate all files conform to Prettier formatting rules

title: Build and Deployment Verification
description: Confirm that the application builds successfully and deploys on a platform like Vercel without runtime or build errors.

steps.description: Run the full build command used for production deployment
Check build completes without errors or warnings
Deploy the built application to a vercel-like environment
Navigate through the deployed application confirming no runtime errors or missing resources
Validate all main features (dashboard layout, metric cards, charts, data table) load and function normally post deployment

title: Error Handling on Data Fetch Failures
description: Test how the dashboard behaves when simulated data fetches fail or return invalid data, ensuring graceful error handling.

steps.description: Simulate a failure in fetching metric data
Verify metric cards display a friendly error message or placeholder data
Simulate corrupted or empty chart data response
Confirm charts either show no data messages or safe fallback visuals without crashing
Simulate failure in campaign data table fetch
Ensure table displays an error notice and allows UI recovery when data is restored

title: Sidebar Collapse and Navigation Functionality
description: Validate the collapsible sidebar toggling works correctly and that navigation links lead to the expected dashboard sections.

steps.description: Click sidebar toggle button to collapse the sidebar
Verify sidebar visually collapses and expands correctly
Click on each navigation item in the sidebar
Confirm that the main content updates to the selected dashboard section (metrics, charts, campaign data)
Repeat navigation on mobile device or viewport
Check that navigation remains functional and accessible in mobile layout
